https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ne8UT7gGyMmLbXHLLf3bvo8NaQs.jpg Inspired by real events, 3 Way Junction follows a London architect who travels to the grand dunes of the Namibian Desert to escape. But when he finds himself stranded alone, desperately waiting for a ride that never comes, he must embark on a bitter rite of passage. 3 Way Junction
